Articles.Content:
After a long time of having the demo on my computer and watching YouTube videos I bought the game a few weeks back and finally built a space station. it orbits at around 250,000 km above kirbin. Feedback is much appreciated!

sorry about the horrible quality, and how can I put images directly into the post without a link?

Right now, links are the only way to put pics in posts. My preferred method is to upload them to an Imgur account (it's free) and use their BBCode link. There are other services, but Imgur is pretty easy to use.
Welcome. Stations are always fun. But yeah, imgur
